value.name: Residents raise concerns about vacant buildings after string of unsolved fires
value.description: Residents in the Booker Washington Heights community are looking at their neighbors, or lack thereof, after a string of unsolved fires burned buildings over the last week. The Columbia Police Department and the Columbia Richland County Fire Department are investigating fires at vacant homes on the 3400 Block of Carver Street and the 2600 Block of High Circle.
